segments.text: I need some help catching up . Are you good at typing or could you help me xerox ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you ! There are papers on the table to start with .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , I will get right to that .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I really appreciate the help . How many years have you been with the company ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I have a special assignment coming up . Would you be interested in helping me on it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'd like to , but I am very busy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'll make sure that management keeps you in mind for special projects in the future . Thanks for the help !
segments.speaker: S2
